title: Language Filter
body: I cant seem to turn off the in-game language filter. The language filter inside the client is turned off but its not turning off the in-game one like previous clients. Please help!

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few times here on H&S. It seems the button in the client may not be flipping the setting off in the game's files. You should be able to resolve this by either swapping over to the *Legacy Client* (from the login screen) and disabling it there before swapping back over to the new Client. If that doesn't work, I recommend taking the steps below:

>**1.** Launch League and Log in then minimize the client
**2.** Navigate to the Config Folder **(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)** and open the LCUAccountPreferences.yaml file with Notepad any other text editor
**3.** Find the line that says "**chatFilterDisabled: false**" and change it to **"chatFilterDisabled: true"**
**4.** Save the changes you made to this file in your text editor, then close League and relog.
**5.** Your chat filter should show as disabled after checking your settings (cog in top-right of the client) under your *Chat & Friends* section.

Let me know if this helped!
Under there it already says true. Any other suggestions?

Unfortunately, no. If those workarounds don't work, it's totally bugged and I'd recommend reporting it on our [**Bug Tracker.**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
